resources.string: Uses ObservableFields to automatically refresh the UI and showcases common bad practices
Uses a ViewModel to hold data and handle user actions, using better alternatives
Camera could not be opened.\nThis occurs when the camera is not available (for example it is already in use) or if the system has denied access (for example when camera access has been disabled).
This sample shows a basic implementation for requesting permissions at runtime.\nClick the button below to request the Camera permission and open a full-screen camera preview.

This sample shows a basic implementation for requesting permissions at runtime. Click the button to request the Camera permission and open a full-screen camera preview. Note: The "RuntimePermissions" sample provides a more complete overview over the runtime permission features available.
Camera access is required to display the camera preview.
Permission is not available. Requesting camera permission.
Camera permission is available. Starting preview.
Camera permission was granted. Starting preview.
The image to blur and save.
Go to Settings -> Apps and Notifications -> WorkManager Demo -> App Permissions and grant access to Storage.
Are you sure you want to delete this recording?
This is a call recording from my phone
There are no recordings in this phone.\nTo enable recording select \"Enable recording\" from the menu.
Are you sure you want to delete all of your recordings?
The phone is now on a call
If recording was enabled, recording should have started, if not you can enable recording in the application, the phone will stop the recording when the conversation ends
Unfortunately, it is not possible to record calls on this device. (Usually because another application/service is using the microphone in the background)
The selected storage location is read-only.\nNew calls will not be recorded!

The selected storage location is not readable.

Welcome to Call Recorder!

Results may vary. Manufacturers are often known to break call recording functionality on their devices, and there isn\'t a whole lot I can do about it.

Check local laws regarding recording of telephone conversations. Some localities may ban the recording of telephone conversations, or may require both parties to be informed of the recording first. Also, if you are talking to someone in a different locality their recording laws may apply to you.
Failed to create folder: no write access.
Failed to create folder: folder already exists.
